query.statement:
SELECT 1 AS GUBN --,CASE SPEC_TYP WHEN '1' THEN '1 LEVEL' WHEN '2' THEN '2 LEVEL' WHEN '3' THEN '보수' ELSE '' END TYPE ,SPEC_TYP AS SPEC_TYP ,IDNRK ,TEXT ,CRDAT ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY MANDT, CRDAT, SEQNO, WOKNUM, MATNR, IDNRK, SPEC_TYP, SERIAL) AS RNB ,0 SEQ ,ITEM_SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT008 WHERE (MANDT,CRDAT,SEQNO,WOKNUM,MATNR,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,MATKL) IN (
SELECT MANDT ,CRDAT ,SEQNO ,WOKNUM ,MATNR ,IDNRK ,ITEM_SEQ ,MATKL FROM (
SELECT MANDT ,CRDAT ,SEQNO ,WOKNUM ,MATNR ,IDNRK ,ITEM_SEQ ,PRCTYP ,MATKL ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MANDT,WOKNUM,MATNR,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,MATKL ORDER BY MANDT,WOKNUM,MATNR,IDNRK,ITEM_SEQ,CRDAT DESC,SEQNO DESC) AS ROWNO FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WOKNUM = #HOGIN# AND MATKL = #MATNR#
AND ITEM_SEQ = #ITEM_SEQ#
) AS PP004 WHERE ROWNO=1 AND PRCTYP<>'D'
) AND TEXT <> '' AND SPEC_TYP <> '3'
UNION -- 공백추가
SELECT 2 AS GUBN ,'' AS SPEC_TYP ,'' AS IDNRK ,''AS TEXT ,'' AS CRDAT ,999 AS RNB ,0 AS SEQ ,'' AS ITEM_SEQ FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1
UNION -- 하위블럭
SELECT 3 AS GUBN ,' ' AS SPEC_TYP ,MM011.BLOCK_NO AS IDNRK ,MM011.MAKTX || ' | ' || MM011.SPEC || ' | ' || MM011.ZSIZE || ' | ' || PP004.DZEINR AS TEXT ,'' AS CRDAT ,1000 AS RNB ,0 AS SEQ ,'' AS ITEM_SEQ FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT011 AS MM011 ,( SELECT MANDT ,WOKNUM ,IDNRK ,DZEINR ,ROW_NUMBER() OVER(PARTITION BY MANDT,WOKNUM,IDNRK ORDER BY MANDT,WOKNUM,IDNRK,CRDAT DESC) AS ROWN FROM SAPHEE.ZPPT004 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND WOKNUM = #HOGIN# AND MATKL <> #MATNR# AND MATKL LIKE #MATNR# || '%' AND PRCTYP <> 'D'
) AS PP004 WHERE PP004.MANDT = MM011.MANDT AND PP004.IDNRK = MM011.MATNR AND PP004.ROWN = 1 AND MM011.MANDT = #G_MANDT#
ORDER BY GUBN, RNB FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
